summary: Full-Stack Developer and DevOps Engineer specializing in TypeScript with experience building customer management systems, deploying Docker environments, and integrating APIs across enterprise and freelance projects.

skills.label: Frameworks & Libraries
skills.value: Next.js & React, Express.js, TailwindCSS, DaisyUI5, GSAP

bullets: Lead developer for customer management platform serving a Netherlands-based go-karting company
Architected large full-stack solution handling customer data, event registrations, and improved invoicing workflows
Built internal email template management tool using Express.js with custom React.js interface
Integrated Zoho API to autofill authenticated employee personal information for email templates
Designed and deployed school-wide emergency notification system for ETPZP high school
Managed full DevOps lifecycle from development through production deployment on local, self-hosted infrastructure
Integrated with the school's Active Directory server for authentication
Developed custom WordPress solutions and Shopify themes for multiple clients including Baden, Beautifi, DonChendo and Sitings
Collaborated closely with designers to translate mockups into responsive, pixel-perfect code
Worked with marketing and developer team for SEO optimization
Developing a large customer management system with go-kart event registration and invoicing features to automate business operations
Utilizing TypeScript, Next.js, and Prisma in a well-architected scalable setup
Used Resend for emails, React-PDF for invoice generation, and Google Drive API for storing PDFs
Developed a flash SMS sending system for staff at ETPZP high school to streamline external communication in one centralized interface with additional features
Architected a robust backend using Next.js, TypeScript, GatewayAPI, and PostgreSQL to handle message queuing, delivery and storage
Deployed the solution on a self-hosted school computer running Nginx and Docker on a virtual Ubuntu machine
Built a real estate site selection & finding tool
Integrated PHP and JavaScript with WordPress Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) to display custom post type data
Used Google Maps JavaScript API for interactive map integration with clusters and clickable site pins
